message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget of $1,200,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could consider coming down to $1,130,000. This is a very competitive offer considering its potential worth.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit higher than $1,130,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $1,115,000. That's the highest I can go, considering my budget.
